EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
PORTUGAL.
DNC 08, DNC 19.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 082359Z JUN BY
   M/V SARMIENTO DE GAMBOA ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING
   40-47.3N 013-06.1W, 44-40.8N 018-12.9W,
   48-24.8N 021-08.3W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1426/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 090100Z JUN 21.
